SEARCH
Package com.example.cab302project.controllers

Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302project.controllers.ProfileController
public class ProfileController extends Object
Controller for the Profile view of the application. Displays the logged-in user's profile info, profile image, and a mini day calendar. Handles navigation (settings, home, friends, logout) and profile display logic.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the profile view after FXML loading. Loads user details, profile image, logo, mini day calendar, and sets the sidebar button.

    • setDefaultProfileImage

      private void setDefaultProfileImage()
      Sets the profile image to a default placeholder.

    • renderMiniDayView

      private void renderMiniDayView()
      Renders a mini day view (24 hour slots) for the sidebar calendar. Highlights any hour blocks with events and displays event names if present.

    • openSettingsPage

      private void openSettingsPage()
      Navigates to the settings page, replacing the current scene with the settings-view.

    • onLogoHover

      private void onLogoHover()
      Handles mouse hover on the logo image, enlarging it for UI feedback.

    • onLogoExit

      private void onLogoExit()
      Handles mouse exit from the logo image, resetting it to original size.

    • goToHome

      private void goToHome()
      Navigates back to the main calendar (home) page, replacing the current scene.

    • openFriendsPage

      private void openFriendsPage()
      Navigates to the friends page, replacing the current scene.

    • handleLogOut

      private void handleLogOut()
      Handles logout action. Clears the session and returns to the login screen, matching the initial launch window size and behavior.

    • openPage

      private void openPage(String fxmlPath, String title)
      Opens a given FXML page in a new maximized window, closing the current profile view.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - Path to the FXML file.
      title - Window title to set.
